Primary Contact: Lenetta Parry, Executive Director; Email: info@cofoodbank.com
Alternate Contact: David Purdon, Associate Executive Director; Email: david@cofoodbank.com
Service Details: - Supports the needs of clients who have special dietary or medical requirements including persons with diabetes, cancer, high blood pressure, HIV/AIDS, severe food allergies and eating disorders- Please note that a Doctor’s Note is required for proof of medical condition
How to Apply: Please visit the website, email or phone for additional information on applying for the Special Needs Program
